activities: The collection and use of Personal Information is essential to the conduct of the human resources and financial management of Reader’s Digest and its affiliated entities (“Affiliated Entities”) in the US.  Reader’s Digest (US) receives Personal Information such as name, work and personal contact information, gender, country of citizenship, date of birth; documentation required under immigration laws, payroll data, position related information, talent management information, compensation, management records, and system and application access data (collectively, "Personal Information").
eucountries: Finland, France, Netherlands, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs)and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
